text: The AUG (Armee-Universal-Gewehr—"universal army rifle") is an Austrian bullpup 5.56×45mm NATO assault rifle. It was designed in 1977 by Steyr Mannlicher GmbH & Co KG (formerly Steyr-Daimler-Puch). ==Other websites== *Youtube *Military Today Category:Bullpup rifles Category:Assault rifles Category:5.56 mm firearms
title: Steyr AUG
